mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document ( kb_id, filename, filetype, size, metadata, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( CAST(#{kbId} AS uuid), #{filename}, #{filetype}, #{size}, CAST(#{metadata} AS jsonb), #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE document
kb_id = CAST(#{kbId} AS uuid),
filename = #{filename},
filetype = #{filetype},
size = #{size},
metadata = CAST(#{metadata} AS jsonb),
updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = CAST(#{id} AS uuid)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM document WHERE id = CAST(#{id} AS uuid)
